map.alt: Map showing the walking route from Hostel Brikette to Positano port with points 1–5.
map.caption: Route overview: Hostel → Port (points 1–5).

point1.alt: Intersection near Viale Pasitea with a marked route and a label: '1 Turn Right'.
point1.caption: Point 1: turn right.

tabacchi.alt: Tabacchi storefront with an ATM next to it.
tabacchi.caption: Tabacchi near point 1 (good landmark).

point2.alt: Road switchback with a marked line toward stairs and a label: '2 Take the stairs straight ahead'.
point2.caption: Point 2: leave the road and take the stairs straight ahead.

point3.alt: Narrow alley with steps and a marked path, labelled '3 Take the stairs straight ahead'.
point3.caption: Point 3: continue straight down the stairs.

point4.alt: Crosswalk and road with a marked route toward stairs on the right, labelled '4'.
point4.caption: Point 4: cross the road, turn left briefly, then take the stairs down on the right.

point5.alt: Small square near the port with a marked route, labelled '5'.
point5.caption: Point 5: continue under the archway toward the port.

tickets.alt: Ferry ticket booths at Positano port with timetable boards.
tickets.caption: Ticket booths: check the sign for the next departure.

port.alt: View of Positano port with a ferry in the foreground and Positano hillside behind.
port.caption: Positano port: wait near the end of the pier for boarding calls.
